inclusion.criterion: Adult individual 18 yr. of age or older.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cognitively intact and capable of giving informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of a non-penetrating traumatic SCI to the cervical spine
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Patient and Caregiver agree to use Care Connect app or web version of VirTrial platform for virtual visits.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior history of: Recent or ongoing infection,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinically significant cardiovascular, lung, renal, hepatic, or endocrine disease,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Immunosuppression as defined by WBC < 3, 000 cells/ml at baseline screening,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Having a contraindication to MRI scans
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other acute or chronic medical conditions that, in the opinion of the investigator, may increase the risks associated with study participation or HB-adMSC administration
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has Parkinson's disease and is on Levodopa and Trihexyphenidyl. He experiences slowness of movement and tremors, but his medications help with shaking and slow movement.
